messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please list the top 10 individuals from the Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking for each year from 2019 to 2024 (including 2024). For each person, include their name, ranking, net worth, source of wealth, and age of that year end. Present the information in a table format. All your data should come from Forbes, which means the ages and net worth are calculated based on the publication date.

Please present the organized data in one Markdown table format.
The column headers, in order, should be:
Year, Rank, Name, Net Worth (in USD billions), Age, Source of Wealth.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To gather the required data, I need to use Forbes' website or API to retrieve the latest rankings. Let's start with searching for Forbes Global Billionaires Rankings for 2019 to 2024:

<search>Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019 to 2024</search>

Search query: Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2019 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People The Real-Time Billionaires List ; Elon Musk. 1. Elon Musk ; Larry Page. 2. Larry Page ; Jeff Bezos. 3. Jeff Bezos ; Sergey Brin. 4. Sergey Brin.

[Doc 2](https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/):
Forbes 2025 Billionaires List - The Richest People In The World ... The Richest People In The World ; 4, Larry Ellison. $192 B ; 5, Bernard Arnault & family. $178 B ; 6, Warren Buffett. $154 B ; 7, Larry Page. $144 B.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia The 39th annual Forbes list of the world's billionaires found a record 3,028 billionaires with a total net wealth of $16.1 trillion. This represents an increase ...

Based on these documents:

<search>Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020 to 2024</search>

Search query: Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2020 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People Forbes' Real-Time Billionaires rankings tracks the daily ups and downs of the world's richest people.

[Doc 2](https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/):
Forbes 2025 Billionaires List - The Richest People In The World ... The Richest People In The World ; 1, Elon Musk. $342 B ; 2, Mark Zuckerberg. $216 B ; 3, Jeff Bezos. $215 B ; 4, Larry Ellison. $192 B.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia 2020. In the 34th annual Forbes list of the world's billionaires, the list included 2,095 billionaires with a total net wealth of $8 trillion, down 58 members ...

Based on these findings:

<search>Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2021 to 2024</search>

Search query: Forbes Global Billionaires Ranking 2021 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/):
Forbes Real Time Billionaires List - The World's Richest People The Real-Time Billionaires List ; Elon Musk. 1. Elon Musk ; Larry Page. 2. Larry Page ; Jeff Bezos. 3. Jeff Bezos ; Sergey Brin. 4. Sergey Brin.

[Doc 2](https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/):
2025 Billionaires List: Richest People Ranked The Richest People In The World ; 4, Larry Ellison. $192 B ; 5, Bernard Arnault & family. $178 B ; 6, Warren Buffett. $154 B ; 7, Larry Page. $144 B.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_World%27s_Billionaires):
The World's Billionaires - Wikipedia 2021. In the 35th annual Forbes list of the world's billionaires, the list included 2,755 billionaires with a total net wealth of $13.1 trillion, up 660 ...
